public java.lang.String[] terms
An array of strings that will hold each term. And 'n' is the size of the array.

Constructor Detail

Polynomial

public Polynomial(java.lang.String s)
Constructor. Takes the polynomial as a string and adds each individual term to the array.

Method Detail

evaluate

public double evaluate(double x)
Evaluates the polynomial at 'x', like an 'f(x)' equation, and returns the 'y' value.

roots

public double[] roots()
Returns all the real roots of the polynomial. Returns an array of doubles.

subtract

public Polynomial subtract(Polynomial p)
Used for subtracting another polynomial from this one. Returns a new polynomial that is the difference between the first two.
